meaning_str.bing:
v. 显示；展示；陈列；展出
n. 展示；陈列；表现；展览
网络. 显示器；显示屏；显示方式

显示器；显示屏；显示方式

展示；显示；陈列；展出；演示；表现；显露；在屏幕上显示；炫耀；夸示；为求偶作炫耀行为；公开展示情感；（通过行为或外观）表达；揭示；呈现
展示；显示；展览；陈列；演示；表演；显示器；显示装置；（情感的）流露

1.en: With the FlickrView, it will be easy to display images from Flickr, so you are ready to create the rest of the user interface.
1.cn: 使用FlickrView可以方便地显示Flickr中的图像，因此您现在可以准备创建用户界面的其余部分。

2.en: An easy-to-use intuitive graphic interface and 3D workspace display the system operation including physical and conceptual objects.
2.cn: 易于操作的直观图形界面和三维工作空间可以显示系统操作。

3.en: A waxwork of French President Nicolas Sarkozy gets a few final touches before going on display at Madame Tussaud's in London.
3.cn: 法国总统尼古拉萨科齐的蜡像进行最后润色，将陈列在伦敦的杜莎夫人蜡像馆。

0.en: Yeah, it's just a real time display of current operations.
0.cn: 是的，它只是实时地显示了目前的操作步骤。

1.en: The display is synced to your phone. Give it a try. All right.
1.cn: 显示器和你的手机同步了。来试试。好的。

2.en: You employ a visual display designed to make yourself distinctive and memorable.
2.cn: 只需使用一个显示屏就可以为你设计出一套与众不同夺人眼球的造型。

3.en: Yeah. It's a front-projected holographic display combined with laser-based finger tracking. Here, I'll show you.
3.cn: 是啊，这是正投影全息显示加上手指激光跟踪器，来，我给你演示。

4.en: Today was meant to be a display of your power.
4.cn: 今天，你们本来想让世人一睹你们风采的。

5.en: Australopithecus isn't supposed to be in that display.
5.cn: 南方古猿不应该在那里展览的。

6.en: I'm telling you, I like the food. You like the Purple Rain display.
6.cn: 我真的很喜欢那里的食物。你喜欢那里的紫雨（摇滚名曲）装饰。

7.en: Peppa and her family have come to the summer fete. Look, I display rescue vehicles.
7.cn: 佩奇和他的家人来到了夏日游园会。看，那里有救援交通工具的展示。

8.en: Just, please, bear with me if I display symptoms of caffeine withdrawal. No worries.
8.cn: 也请两位在我出现咖啡因脱瘾症状时尽量包容一下。没问题。

9.en: Okay, Farkle. Where is she? Whatever have I done to deserve this display of affection?
9.cn: 法尔科，她人哪儿去了？我这是做了什么值得你在大庭广众之下表达爱意？

10.en: To find out a little bit more, I went to meet the brains behind the display, Wilson Mau.
10.cn: 为了了解得更多，我去见见幕后指挥者，威尔森. 茅。

11.en: It's because you're an artist. I'm glad you decided to display your work. I got your note in my teacher's box.
11.cn: 是因为你是一名艺术家，我很高兴你决定展示你的画，我收到了你的纸条。

12.en: The fireworks for tonight's display have been set up on the three barges out there in the middle of the harbor.
12.cn: 今晚表演的烟花已经放在码头中间的三艘船上了。

13.en: I read a theory once that the human intellect was like peacock feathers. Just an extravagant display intended to attract a mate.
13.cn: 我曾经看过一个理论，人类的智慧就如同孔雀的羽毛，极尽炫耀，只是为了吸引异性。

14.en: Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony. Great. What a wonderful display of togetherness.
14.cn: 全世界都和平和谐，全世界都和平和谐，全世界都和平和谐，和平，和谐。唱得好。这真是一次精彩至极的集体大合唱啊。

15.en: Beautiful early morning in Hong Kong and I am heading out to the barge, which is where Wilson and his crew are working, setting up all the fireworks in preparation for the display.
15.cn: 这是香港早晨，我前往驳船去见在那里工作的威尔森和他的队员们，他们在放置所有准备表演的烟花。

16.en: Anyway, the update should prevent any further voices, but you will let me know if any of the hosts display or exhibit any unusual behavior, won't you, Bernard? Yes, of course. Good.
16.cn: 总之，程序升级应该能阻止一切幻听了，但是如果有任何接待员有异常表现，都要告诉我，伯纳德。好的，当然了。好。

17.en: I've been told the 250 squid who had been part of moon's display are, in fact, employees... Eddie? ...Of three-star restaurant les calmars... There's someone at the door. ...and that none of them were harmed during the incident. Whether they will be returning to their usual work is not yet...
17.cn: “参加伯乐剧院演出的250只鱿鱼，其实是从……”埃迪？“一个三星级酒店雇来的……”有人敲门。“……值得庆幸的是250只鱿鱼无一受伤。至于他们能否重返原来工作的餐厅……”
